text: Making a four day goodwill visit, the Pakistan Naval Ship "Saif" arrived in Sri Lanka yesterday (5th Nov.).The ship was accorded a traditional welcome upon its arrival at the Port of Colombo.The 123 m long and 13.2 m wide ship, 'Saif' carries a crew of 225 naval personnel.Before its departure on Wednesday (8th Nov.), the crew of the ship is scheduled to take part in a number of programs organized by the Sri Lanka Navy.
title: Pakistani Naval ship arrives
